p: The CCl 4 was administered at a dose of 1 mL/kg ( i.p.) with vehicle (olive oil) [ 25]. The aqueous extract of C. europaea was administered at a single dose of 250 mg/kg. The dose of the aqueous extract of C. europaea (250 mg/kg) was selected based on the previous efficacy studies (acute and subacute toxicity studies and many previous pharmacological activities of C. europaea) [ 19, 26]. Silymarin (40 mg/kg) was administered to the animals orally [ 27].
